--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "shredder8908" <shredder007@e...> wrote:
> A question I forgot to ask is if Intelligence affects range weapon 
> damage, if it doesn't, what increases range attack damage?

I know for sure that strength increase weapon range.  I think const might affect weapons damage.

I do know that dex, strength, and intelligence (of course level does too) effects mana.

I also know it's possible to have negative initial values for either mana or health that respectively make a character unable to attack or 
instanteously die upon receiving any attack.

I also know that summoned fire elementals, skeletons, and ghosts can have negative health and mana values without having any 
effect on them.

Literally, if I knew where the formulas for determing things are, I would stop to work out guides for reasonable limits on certain stats so 
that you wouldn't accidently get negative values for either health or mana.

Right now, my slime has a negative mana value. :( Since I have maxed out most of the other stats, my only choice is to increase its 
experience level. 

Does anyone think a team with virtually all of its members at experience level 444 can beat a certain ocean going scenario in the 
tevfifty?

* * *

I also know that OpenGlad with crash if you try to use the cheat code to change character type.
